properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 12:07PM CST until January 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area this afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of one to two inches and ice accumulations of
around two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Sedgwick, Harper and Sumner Counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Trees, power lines
and elevated surfaces will become ice covered late this
afternoon into this evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST SATURDAY
